definition:
ذر darra u (darr) to strew, scatter, spread (هـ s.th.); to sprinkle (ب هـ on s.th. s.th.) │ ذر الرماد في عينيه(ar-ramāda fī ‘ainaihī) to throw dust in s.o.’s eyes; -- u (ذرور durūr) to rise, come up, rise resplendent over the horizon (sun) │ ذر قرنه (qarnuhū) it began to show, it emerged


ذر darr strewing, scattering, sprinkling; (coll.) tiny particles, atoms, specks, motes
